filename: M2 Machine Gun and MK-19 Range CONOP.pptx
path: /Users/arpithaprakash/Capstone/3-2CR CONOPs&DRAWs/New folder - Copy (59)/M2 Machine Gun and MK-19 Range CONOP.pptx

sections.MISSION: K TRP, 3/2CR conducts a M2 Machine Gun and MK19 range for all Soldiers at Range 311 on 05 OCT 2023. This range will give Troopers an opportunity to qualify on the dismounted M2 Machine Gun and MK-19 weapon systems.
sections.END STATE:
All M2 Machine Gun and MK-19 gunners are qualified.
Training Objectives: All M2 Machine Gun and MK-19 gunners throughout the Regiment are able to engage targets and qualify on their weapon systems.
Task Organization:
OIC: 1LT Wuerthner RSO: SSG Garcia
NCOIC: SFC Pelletier Medical: CPL Stovall Primary Safeties: SGT Cravens, SGT Voss, SGT Mendoza, SGT Zinke, SGT Torres, CPL Holsinger Ammo Handlers: SGT Montlavo, SGT Anderson
Additional range support provided by 3rd PLT Kronos.
2 Pax Gate Guard 2 Pax for Score Keeping
1 PAX RTO 3 PAX Ammo Point
Timeline:
0600- Range Detail SP to Range 311. 0700- Ammo Drop off
0830- Initial trainees arrive on range
0850- Safety Brief
0900- Range Hot/First Round Down Range
1700- Range Cold/End of Training
1705- Police Call
1730- Ammo Pick up
1800- All Paxs RTB
Ammo Allocation: 36 Allotted Shooters
49 Requested
